LanguageData.agriculture.label: agriculture I
LanguageData.agriculture.description:
Researches plant genetics to unlock new types of plants to grow! 

 Unlocks a new tier of vegetables to grow. 

 Unlocks sowing of Snow Beats, Beans, Red Lentils, and Olives.
LanguageData.agricultureII.label: agriculture II
LanguageData.agricultureII.description:
Researches plant genetics to unlock new types of plants to grow! 

 Unlocks a new fruits to grow. Fruit has a higher nutrition and requires less to make meals. 

 Unlocks sowing of Grapes, Agave, Strawberries, Blueberries, and Watermelons.
LanguageData.agricultureIII.label: agriculture III
LanguageData.agricultureIII.description:
Researches plant genetics to unlock new and exciting new types of plants to grow! Requires Tree Sowing. 

 Unlocks new fruit trees to grow. Fruit trees have a longer grow time but a higher yield. 

 Unlocks sowing of Apples, Bananas, Oranges, and Peaches trees.
LanguageData.VG_Ambrosia.label: ambrosia
LanguageData.VG_Ambrosia.description: Researches the ability to grow ambrosia in hydroponic basins.
LanguageData.agricultureIV.label: Wild biome plants
LanguageData.agricultureIV.description:
Researches plant genetics to unlock new and exciting types of plants to grow! 

 Unlocks new fruits and trees to grow. Fruit trees have a longer grow time but a higher yield. 

 Unlocks sowing of cherry, coconut, fig, date trees. Pineapples, cloudberries, and gooseberries.
LanguageData.VG_HoneyTree.label: Honey Bee Tree
LanguageData.VG_HoneyTree.description: Researches engineered bee trees that attract bees to live in and produce honey! Requires Tree Sowing. \n\n Unlocks Bee trees.
LanguageData.Cocoa.description.description: Sow cocoa plants to create your own delicious chocolate. Eating chocolate fulfills the need for recreation, and it's valuable on the market too. \n\nUnlocks Trees and Bushes.
